name: A Snail Life
description:
Entry for the KeysToTheJam2021 GameJam

Follow Stephen the Snail's journey as he tries to find a nice home for himself. 
He will have to run from the salt-pouring hand and avoid the large feet that threaten to squish him!

Issues and how to avoid them:
If you tab out of the game, it freezes up - but it'll close if you just kill it in task manager. 

if you press the exit window button - you need to press any button on the keyboard afterwards in order to close the window.
